author_ssm: Yingwen Huang, under the supervision of John Zarrillo
unittitle_ssm: Maybelle L. Mann papers and photographs
abstract_ssm: The papers and photographs document the life of Maybelle L. Mann and her family in the Bedford Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn from 1919 to 1999. Holidays, special events, and leisure activities (beach trips, parks, etc.) of the family are depicted throughout the photographs in the album. The Mann family moved to Brooklyn before 1920. Maybelle later attended Columbia University and became a school teacher.
